006package dev.metaschema.oscal.tools.cli.core.commands;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.yaml.YAMLFactory;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.yaml.YAMLFactoryBuilder;
010import com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.yaml.YAMLGenerator;
011
012import org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine;
013import org.apache.commons.cli.Option;
014import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
015import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
016
017import java.io.IOException;
018import java.io.PrintWriter;
019import java.io.StringWriter;
020import java.io.Writer;
021import java.net.URI;
022import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
023import java.nio.file.Files;
024import java.nio.file.Path;
025import java.nio.file.StandardOpenOption;
026import java.util.Collection;
027import java.util.Comparator;
028import java.util.List;
029import java.util.Map;
030import java.util.Map.Entry;
031import java.util.Set;
032import java.util.TreeMap;
033import java.util.function.Function;
034import java.util.stream.Collectors;
035
036import dev.metaschema.cli.commands.MetaschemaCommands;
037import dev.metaschema.cli.processor.CallingContext;
038import dev.metaschema.cli.processor.ExitCode;
039import dev.metaschema.cli.processor.command.AbstractTerminalCommand;
040import dev.metaschema.cli.processor.command.CommandExecutionException;
041import dev.metaschema.cli.processor.command.ExtraArgument;
042import dev.metaschema.cli.processor.command.ICommandExecutor;
043import dev.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
044import dev.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
045import dev.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IDefinitionNodeItem;
046import dev.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IModuleNodeItem;
047import dev.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItemFactory;
048import dev.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
049import dev.metaschema.core.model.MetaschemaException;
050import dev.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IAllowedValue;
051import dev.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IAllowedValuesConstraint;
052import dev.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraintSet;
053import dev.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
054import dev.metaschema.databind.IBindingContext;
055import dev.metaschema.databind.model.IBoundModule;
056import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.OscalBindingContext;
057import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model.OscalCompleteModule;
058import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model.util.AllowedValueCollectingNodeItemVisitor;
059import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model.util.AllowedValueCollectingNodeItemVisitor.AllowedValuesRecord;
060import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
061import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
062
063/**
064 * A CLI command that provides a listing of allowed values constraints by
065 * targeted node.
066 */
067@SuppressWarnings("PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects")
068public class ListAllowedValuesCommand
069    extends AbstractTerminalCommand {
070  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(ListAllowedValuesCommand.class);
071
072  @NonNull
073  private static final String COMMAND = "list-allowed-values";
074  @NonNull
075  private static final List<ExtraArgument> EXTRA_ARGUMENTS = ObjectUtils.notNull(List.of(
076      ExtraArgument.newInstance("destination-file", false)));
077  @NonNull
078  private static final Option CONSTRAINTS_OPTION = ObjectUtils.notNull(
079      Option.builder("c")
080          .hasArgs()
081          .argName("URL")
082          .desc("additional constraint definitions")
083          .build());
084
085  @Override
086  public String getName() {
087    return COMMAND;
088  }
089
090  @Override
091  public String getDescription() {
092    return "List allowed values constraints for the provided Metaschema module";
093  }
094
095  @SuppressWarnings("null")
096  @Override
097  public Collection<? extends Option> gatherOptions() {
098    return List.of(
099        CONSTRAINTS_OPTION,
100        MetaschemaCommands.OVERWRITE_OPTION);
101  }
102
103  @Override
104  public List<ExtraArgument> getExtraArguments() {
105    return EXTRA_ARGUMENTS;
106  }
107
108  @Override
109  public ICommandExecutor newExecutor(CallingContext callingContext, CommandLine cmdLine) {
110    return ICommandExecutor.using(callingContext, cmdLine, this::executeCommand);
111  }
112
113  /**
114   * Execute the list allowed values command.
115   *
116   * @param callingContext
117   *          information about the calling context
118   * @param cmdLine
119   *          the parsed command line details
120   * @throws CommandExecutionException
121   *           if an error occurred while executing the command
122   */
123  @SuppressWarnings({
124      "PMD.OnlyOneReturn", // readability
125      "PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException",
126      "PMD.CognitiveComplexity",
127      "PMD.CyclomaticComplexity"
128  })
129  protected void executeCommand(
130      @NonNull CallingContext callingContext,
131      @NonNull CommandLine cmdLine) throws CommandExecutionException {
132
133    List<String> extraArgs = cmdLine.getArgList();
134
135    Path destination = null;
136    if (!extraArgs.isEmpty()) {
137      destination = MetaschemaCommands.handleDestination(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(extraArgs.get(0)), cmdLine);
138    }
139
140    URI currentWorkingDirectory = ObjectUtils.notNull(getCurrentWorkingDirectory().toUri());
141    Set<IConstraintSet> constraintSets = MetaschemaCommands.loadConstraintSets(
142        cmdLine,
143        CONSTRAINTS_OPTION,
144        currentWorkingDirectory);
145
146    IBindingContext bindingContext;
147    IBoundModule module;
148    try {
149      bindingContext = OscalBindingContext.builder()
150          .constraintSet(constraintSets)
151          .build();
152      module = bindingContext.registerModule(OscalCompleteModule.class);
153    } catch (MetaschemaException ex) {
154      throw new CommandExecutionException(ExitCode.PROCESSING_ERROR,
155          String.format("Unable to register OSCAL module. %s", ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
156          ex);
157    } catch (RuntimeException ex) {
158      throw new CommandExecutionException(ExitCode.RUNTIME_ERROR,
159          String.format("Unable to initialize the binding context. %s", ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
160          ex);
161    }
162
163    try {
164      if (destination == null) {
165        Writer stringWriter = new StringWriter();
166        try (PrintWriter writer = new PrintWriter(stringWriter)) {
167          generateAllowedValuesList(module, writer, null);
168        }
169
170        // Print the result
171        if (LOGGER.isInfoEnabled()) {
172          LOGGER.info(stringWriter.toString());
173        }
174      } else {
175        try (Writer writer = Files.newBufferedWriter(
176            destination,
177            StandardCharsets.UTF_8,
178            StandardOpenOption.CREATE,
179            StandardOpenOption.WRITE,
180            StandardOpenOption.TRUNCATE_EXISTING)) {
181          try (PrintWriter printWriter = new PrintWriter(writer)) {
182            generateAllowedValuesList(module, printWriter, null);
183          }
184        }
185      }
186    } catch (IOException ex) {
187      throw new CommandExecutionException(ExitCode.IO_ERROR, ex);
188    } catch (RuntimeException ex) {
189      throw new CommandExecutionException(ExitCode.RUNTIME_ERROR, ex);
190    }
191  }
192
193  private static void generateAllowedValuesList(
194      @NonNull IModule module,
195      @NonNull PrintWriter writer,
196      @SuppressWarnings("unused") @Nullable String metapath) throws IOException {
197    AllowedValueCollectingNodeItemVisitor walker = new AllowedValueCollectingNodeItemVisitor();
198
199    StaticContext staticContext = StaticContext.builder()
200        .defaultModelNamespace(module.getXmlNamespace())
201        .build();
202
203    IModuleNodeItem moduleNodeItem = INodeItemFactory.instance().newModuleNodeItem(module);
204
205    // if (metapath != null) {
206    // MetapathExpression filter = MetapathExpression.compile(metapath,
207    // staticContext);
208    //
209    // DynamicContext dynamicContext = new DynamicContext(staticContext);
210    // ISequence<?> sequence = filter.evaluate(moduleNodeItem, dynamicContext);
211    // assert sequence != null;
212    // }
213
214    DynamicContext dynamicContext = new DynamicContext(staticContext);
215    dynamicContext.disablePredicateEvaluation();
216
217    walker.visit(moduleNodeItem, dynamicContext);
218
219    Map<IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>,
220        List<AllowedValueCollectingNodeItemVisitor.AllowedValuesRecord>> allowedValuesByTarget
221            = ObjectUtils.notNull(walker.getAllowedValueLocations().stream()
222                .flatMap(location -> location.getAllowedValues().stream())
223                .collect(Collectors.groupingBy(AllowedValuesRecord::getTarget,
224                    () -> new TreeMap<>(Comparator.comparing(IDefinitionNodeItem::getMetapath)),
225                    Collectors.mapping(Function.identity(), Collectors.toUnmodifiableList()))));
226
227    generateYaml(allowedValuesByTarget, writer);
228  }
229
230  private static void generateYaml(
231      @NonNull Map<IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>, List<AllowedValuesRecord>> allowedValuesByTarget,
232      @NonNull PrintWriter writer) throws IOException {
233
234    YAMLFactoryBuilder builder = YAMLFactory.builder();
235    YAMLFactory factory = ObjectUtils.notNull(builder
236        .enable(YAMLGenerator.Feature.MINIMIZE_QUOTES)
237        .enable(YAMLGenerator.Feature.WRITE_DOC_START_MARKER)
238        .enable(YAMLGenerator.Feature.ALWAYS_QUOTE_NUMBERS_AS_STRINGS)
239        .disable(YAMLGenerator.Feature.SPLIT_LINES)
240        .build());
241
242    try (YAMLGenerator generator = factory.createGenerator(writer)) {
243
244      generator.writeStartObject(); // toplevel
245
246      writeLocations(allowedValuesByTarget, generator);
247
248      generator.writeEndObject(); // toplevel
249    }
250  }
251
252  private static void writeLocations(
253      @NonNull Map<IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>, List<AllowedValuesRecord>> allowedValuesByTarget,
254      @NonNull YAMLGenerator generator) throws IOException {
255    generator.writeFieldName("locations");
256    generator.writeStartObject(); // locations
257
258    for (Map.Entry<IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>, List<AllowedValuesRecord>> entry : allowedValuesByTarget.entrySet()) {
259      assert entry != null;
260      writeLocation(entry, generator);
261    }
262    generator.writeEndObject(); // locations
263  }
264
265  private static void writeLocation(
266      @NonNull Map.Entry<IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>, List<AllowedValuesRecord>> entry,
267      @NonNull YAMLGenerator generator) throws IOException {
268
269    IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> target = ObjectUtils.notNull(entry.getKey());
270
271    generator.writeFieldName(metapath(target));
272
273    generator.writeStartObject(); // metapath
274
275    writeLocationConstraints(entry, generator);
276
277    generator.writeEndObject(); // metapath
278  }
279
280  private static void writeLocationConstraints(
281      @NonNull Entry<IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>, List<AllowedValuesRecord>> entry,
282      @NonNull YAMLGenerator generator) throws IOException {
283    IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> target = ObjectUtils.notNull(entry.getKey());
284
285    List<AllowedValuesRecord> allowedValues = entry.getValue();
286    if (allowedValues != null) {
287      generator.writeFieldName("constraints");
288
289      generator.writeStartArray(); // constraints
290
291      for (AllowedValuesRecord record : allowedValues) {
292        assert target.equals(record.getTarget());
293
294        writeAllowedValue(record, generator);
295      }
296
297      generator.writeEndArray(); // constraints
298    }
299  }
300
301  private static void writeAllowedValue(@NonNull AllowedValuesRecord record, @NonNull YAMLGenerator generator)
302      throws IOException {
303
304    generator.writeStartObject(); // constraint
305
306    generator.writeStringField("type", "allowed-values");
307
308    IAllowedValuesConstraint constraint = record.getAllowedValues();
309    if (constraint.getId() != null) {
310      generator.writeStringField("identifier", constraint.getId());
311    }
312    generator.writeStringField("location", metapath(record.getLocation()));
313    generator.writeStringField("target", constraint.getTarget().getPath());
314
315    List<String> values = constraint.getAllowedValues().values().stream()
316        .map(IAllowedValue::getValue)
317        .collect(Collectors.toList());
318    generator.writeFieldName("values");
319    if (values == null) {
320      generator.writeNull();
321    } else {
322      generator.writeStartArray();
323      for (String value : values) {
324        generator.writeString(value);
325      }
326      generator.writeEndArray();
327    }
328
329    generator.writeBooleanField("allow-other", constraint.isAllowedOther());
330
331    URI source = constraint.getSource().getSource();
332    generator.writeStringField("source", source == null ? "builtin" : source.toString());
333
334    generator.writeEndObject(); // constraint
335  }
336
337  private static String metapath(@NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> item) {
338    return metapath(item.getMetapath());
339  }
340
341  private static String metapath(@NonNull String path) {
342    // remove position 1 predicates
343    return path.replace("[1]", "");
344  }
345}
